channel.title: [PI] Cataclysm Released
channel.description:
This is erazedpkz as based, but more improved. - Was planning on turning into a server but decided not to.
Client/Server - [url=http://uppit.com/vxhrpoqrns6h/Cataclysm.zip]Download Cataclysm.zip @ UppIT[/url] Cache - [url=http://uppit.com/whjmswfdtmjs/CataCache.zip]Download Cata.Cache.zip @ UppIT[/url]
Features: Npc clipping A lot better summoning (Can only cast once every 10 seconds) + Scrolls Lots of fixes overall
[SPOILER="Media"][IMG]http://uploadnow.org/image/338326-cata.png[/img] [IMG]http://uploadnow.org/image/338327-cata1.png[/img][/SPOILER]

item.title: [PI] Cataclysm Released
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“MattOwn3r, post:4, topic:443782”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=546460.msg4006134#msg4006134 date=1338659037]
I wouldn’t use this anyways the link was deleted on rune-serber because it had a virus http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/317226-pi-erasedpkz-full-summoning-bob-torva-beast-combat-602-a.html
[/quote]

You’re not too bright are you.[/quote]It’s erasedpkz based and on rune-serber it was deleted because it had a virus?..

Read full topic
